jtorrent.protocols.bittorrent.thp

Class AnnounceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.protocols.bittorrent.thp.AnnounceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.simpleframework.http.core.Container

    public class AnnounceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.simpleframework.http.core.Container
    Handles Announce messages from socket connections for a container using the simpleframework.http library for handling http messages on the URL http://ip:port/announce of the tracker server. Keeps a reference to a map of torrents known to the server.
